explanation: [0-0] A young man in a red shirt, a red hat, and blue overalls is standing in a room. He is holding a mobile phone in his left hand and his right hand is on the screen. There is a black chair on the right with a pink object on it. Part of the kitchen area is visible in the background, with white cabinets and countertops.

[0-4] He swipes his right hand across the phone screen, then widens his eyes, opens his mouth, leans forward, and lifts the phone to his eyes with his left hand. Immediately, the screen switches to the phone screen. A hand is holding the phone, which is playing a video of a girl in an orange top and pink pants dancing to music. A window can be seen in the background, with a parking lot outside. A picture frame of a man is on the windowsill. The screen then cuts back to the face of the man in the red shirt, who widens his eyes and opens his mouth. The camera then zooms in on the phone screen, where a white thumbs-up icon and the white text "284K" can be seen at the top. Below is a white thumbs-down icon and the white text "Dislike."
